job_description:
We are seeking a Senior Full Stack Java Developer who will be responsible for developing solutions by leveraging their knowledge of Java and SQL development. Responsibilities include working with end users as well as team members to lead design, development, testing, and maintenance of automation projects across the organization. Demonstrate expert knowledge of E2E development process and concepts through the request lifecycle. Must be able to collaborate with the business to write and document requirements, then translate them to code within the application.

All Work to to be performed at CORE in Kanata. This is not a remote position. Please make sure you are able to be in Ottawa/Kanata if you are applying for this job.

Benefits
Casual dress
Dental care
Extended health care
Vision care
Free Parking
Schedule
Monday to Friday
Work Location: In person
